attributes.action: Quash Council Tax Liability Orders As 66 Million People Don't Like The Results!
attributes.background: It appears that liability orders issued to councils by magistrates may be unlawful. We would like the government to issue a ban on these orders until such times as the lawfulness of the summonses issued by councils and therefore the liability orders issued upon them are found to be lawful.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition asking Parliament to make a specific change to the law, if that's what you would like to happen.
